data.title: Martin Sheen Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Martin Sheen on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Martin Sheen including The Departed, The Amazing Spider-Man, and more.
data.text:
Sleep Tight, Puddin' Pop

Charlie finds himself in a compromising position after getting drunk and spending the evening with his stalker, Rose, celebrating her birthday. He ends up being confronted by her father, Harvey (Golden Globe and Emmy Award winner MARTIN SHEEN - "The West Wing"), who demands to know Charlie's intentions towards Rose.

Time and Memories

A tender memory in McGarrett's past is suddenly shaken when his former fiancÃ©e, Cathy Wallis, finds her husband slain. McGarrett becomes personally involved in the case and jeopardizes his job when Cathy becomes the prime suspect.

Cry, Lie

Martin Sheen is featured in this episode that centers around Chin Ho Kelly, one of McGarrett's most trusted investigators.

Nightmare

A group of astronauts are captured on the planet Ebon and made prisoners of war. The Ebonites interrogate all of the prisoners using such special methods to get information as torture.
